content:
DataGridViewColumnEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that will handle column-related events of a DataGridView.

In this Article

public delegate void DataGridViewColumnEventHandler(object sender, DataGridViewColumnEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
DataGridViewColumnEventHandler

Remarks

DataGridViewColumnEventArgs provides data for the following DataGridView events:

  • ColumnContextMenuStripChanged
  • ColumnDataPropertyNameChanged
  • ColumnDefaultCellStyleChanged
  • ColumnDisplayIndexChanged
  • ColumnDividerWidthChanged
  • ColumnHeaderCellChanged
  • ColumnMinimumWidthChanged
  • ColumnNameChanged
  • ColumnSortModeChanged
  • ColumnToolTipTextChanged
  • ColumnWidthChanged
